body.p: To His Excellency the Hon Beriah Magoffin Govenor of Kentucky

Whereas Petitions have been circulated in the Counties of Caldwell Lyon, Trigg, Christian & Hopkins beseeching of your excellency to pardon or commute the punishment of Thos B Wadlington convicted at the last November term of the Caldwell Circuit Court of the murder of Milton A Cartwright, We the undersigned Citizens of Caldwell County believing the verdict of the Jury in the Case of said Wadlington to be correct and that he deserves the penalty due to crime from our knowledge of the facts most earnestly beseech of your excellency not to pardon or commute the punishment of said Wadlington and hereby enter our solemn protest against granting the prayer of said Petitions
